nodes.text: Phaeris was a Human female Corellian who worked as a smuggler during the Galactic War. She was one of the contacts of the Havoc Squad during the Battle of Corellia, leading a group of volunteer smugglers aiding the Republic. However, the port where her group's ships were docked was captured by Imperials, forcing Havoc Squad to clear the landing zone.
Phaeris later sent a message to commander of Havoc, expressing her thanks for saving the Lucky Lancer against General Elin Garza's recommendations to destroy it.
